item.title: Amex sees spending growth accelerate as it projects upbeat sales this year
item.description: Amex is also boosting its dividend by 17%.

item.title: Foreigners are chasing U.S. stocks. Historically, that’s a bad sign.
item.description: Foreigners have a tendency to buy U.S. stocks right before crashes.

item.title: Verizon’s stock rises after biggest gain in five years on key subscriber metric
item.description: The company added 568,000 postpaid phone subscribers in the fourth quarter.

item.title: Will Trump’s tough stance on remote work drag everyone else back to the office? Don’t bet on it.

item.title: I’m 67, childless, and have $4.3 million. Do I have enough to start giving money away to my nieces and nephews?
item.description: Your definition of “enough” is what matters most, because you can’t take back gifts.
